refsect1.title: SYNOPSIS
refsect1.para: feed2imaprc is feed2imap's configuration file. It is usually located in ~/.feed2imaprc.

refsect1.title: RESERVED CHARACTERS
refsect1.para: Some characters are reserved in RFC2396 (URI). If you need to include a reserved character in the login/password part of your target URI, replace it with its hex code. For example, @ can be replaced by %40.

refsect1.title: BUGS
refsect1.para: This manpage should probably give more details.
